metadata.description: Ontology of key people in a specific ecosystem, including their contributions and relationships
metadata.author: Author name or organization
metadata.generalization_scope: Description of how this ontology structure can be applied to other contexts

attributes.profile_photo: URL to open profile photo or 'not available in open sources'
attributes.leadership_type: Type of leadership (e.g., Associative, Political, Technical)
attributes.impact_scale: Scale of impact (municipal, regional, state, national, global)
attributes.institution: Institutional affiliation if different from company (optional)
attributes.origin_city: City of origin if different from main city (optional)
attributes.contextual_relevance: Specific relevance to the ecosystem context (optional)
attributes.relevance_to_context: Specific relevance to the main context (optional)

attributes.context: Context in which the relationship exists

clusters.name: Cluster Name
clusters.description: Description of what connects these nodes
